Nesting Grids

You can also nest layouts. In fact, this whole page is a nested grid. How fucking meta is that?

Primary stuff

Example: thirds

The three-column layout does not kick in until $breakpoint-two.

Moe Howard

The alpha stooge.

Larry Fine

A virtuoso violinist, and middle stooge.

Curly Howard

The funniest stooge and favorite by many.

Example: two-to-three
Moe Howard

The alpha stooge.

Larry Fine

A virtuoso violinist, and middle stooge.

Shemp Howard

Stooge antics led to post-traumatic stress disorder.

Curly Howard

The funniest stooge and favorite by many.

Joe

What can you say?

Secondary stuff

Example: halves

The two-column layout does not kick in until $breakpoint-one.

Moe Howard

The alpha stooge.

Larry Fine

A virtuoso violinist, and middle stooge.

Implementation


<div class="group">
    <div class="six-three">
        <main class="primary">
            <!-- Primary content -->
            <h5>Example: thirds</h5>
            <div class="thirds">
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
            </div>

            <h5>Example: two-to-three</h5>
            <div class="two-to-three">
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
            </div><!-- /.two-to-three -->
        </main><!-- /.primary -->
        <aside class="secondary">
            <!-- Secondary content -->
            <h5>Example: halves</h5>
            <div class="halves">
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
                <div class="col">
                    <!-- content -->
                </div>
            </div>
        </aside><!-- /.secondary -->
    </div><!-- /.six-three -->
</div><!-- /.group -->
